statements: UPDATE equipment_inventory SET maintenance_history='Replaced batteries' WHERE equipment_id=100
UPDATE equipment_inventory SET availability=FALSE, maintenance_history='Scheduled maintenance', usage_statistics='{"total_usage": 150}' WHERE equipment_name='Printer'
UPDATE equipment_inventory SET availability = TRUE, maintenance_history = 'Completed maintenance on 2021-10-15', usage_statistics = '{"total_usage_hours": 150}' WHERE equipment_id = 1
UPDATE equipment_inventory SET usage_statistics = '{"total_usage_hours": 200, "last_service_date": "2021-11-05"}', availability = FALSE WHERE equipment_id = 2
UPDATE equipment_inventory SET availability = TRUE WHERE equipment_id = 1;
UPDATE ecotourism_activities SET duration_hours = 4, max_participants = 20 WHERE activity_id = 3;

UPDATE equipment_inventory SET availability = TRUE, maintenance_history = 'Performed regular maintenance', usage_statistics = '{"last_used": "2022-03-15", "total_usage_hours": 150}' WHERE equipment_id = 101;
UPDATE ecotourism_activities SET max_participants = 20, location = 'Forest Preserve', start_date = '2022-04-20', participant_list = '["Alice", "Bob", "Charlie"]' WHERE activity_id = 201;
UPDATE Equipment SET availability = true WHERE equipment_id = 1;
UPDATE EquipmentMaintenance SET maintenance_details = 'Replaced part' WHERE equipment_id = 3;
UPDATE Equipment SET availability = FALSE, maintenance_history = 'Regular maintenance performed on 2023-09-20' WHERE equipment_id = 101;
UPDATE EquipmentAvailability SET available = TRUE WHERE equipment_id = 201 AND date = '2023-09-25';
UPDATE equipment SET quantity = 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE statistics SET usage_count = 25, last_usage_time = '2022-01-15 08:00:00' WHERE equipment_id = 2;
UPDATE equipment SET quantity = quantity + 1, available = true WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE maintenance SET end_date = '2022-12-31', description = 'Scheduled maintenance for equipment ID 2' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE equipment SET availability = false WHERE equipment_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET user_role = 'Admin' WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE equipment SET availability = TRUE WHERE equipment_id = 123;
UPDATE usage SET duration_hours = 2, usage_date = '2022-10-05' WHERE usage_id = 456;
